title: The Motor Vehicle Fleet owned by the Government
decision_details:
The Cabinet took note of the following information of the motor vehicles belonging to the Provincial Councils, collected as per the Assets Management Circular No.01/2017 issued by the Comptroller General's Office established with the objective of managing the assets and expenditure of the Government, presented to the Cabinet by  Hon. Mangala Samaraweera, the Minister of Finance and Mass Media. Further, the Cabinet decided to instruct the relevant authorities to take necessary action expeditiously for the disposal of the vehicles belonging to the Provincial Councils which are not in running condition.
